Comment: President Trump will name and shame cities accused of “obstructing” his crackdown on illegal immigration in a move aimed at “protecting American communities from criminal aliens”, the White House has said.  The president was due to sign an executive order on Monday directing the attorney-general and Department of Homeland Security to publish lists of state and local authorities that hinder the arrest and deportation of undocumented migrants.
